meanings.definition: The quality or state of not being representative.
meanings.sent1: The unrepresentativeness of the sample made the survey results unreliable.
meanings.sent2: The unrepresentativeness of the data skewed the analysis.
meanings.sent3: It was hard to take the unrepresentativeness of the clown seriously.
meanings.sent4: The unrepresentativeness of her painting style was like a splash of color in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The unrepresentativeness of the weather forecast left everyone unprepared for the sudden storm.

meanings.definition: The lack of being typical or characteristic of a particular group or situation.
meanings.sent1: The unrepresentativeness of his behavior puzzled his friends.
meanings.sent2: The unrepresentativeness of the test results raised doubts about its accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The unrepresentativeness of the cat wearing a hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unrepresentativeness in the group was like a lone wolf among sheep.
meanings.sent5: The unrepresentativeness of the new student's accent made it hard to place where she was from.
